sentences.en: A : So am I. Using an abacus is still a basic accounting.
sentences.cn: 我也一样,打算盘仍然是会计的基本技能.

sentences.en: But that position did not arise because of Abacus 2007 - AC 1 .
sentences.cn: 但这些头寸并非源自Abacus2007 -AC1 交易.

sentences.en: Children thinking courses: abacus calculation, English, literature special education, English language.
sentences.cn: 儿童思维训练班: 珠算 、 英语 、 文学启智 、 英语口语.

sentences.en: Do you know how to work an abacus?
Except for the sharp clicking of Chueh - hsin's abacus counters, all was still.
sentences.cn: 房里只有算盘珠子的接连的 、 清脆的响声.

sentences.en: I could write on paper and use abacus for statistic.
sentences.cn: 我可以用纸笔写作，要算统计时就打算盘。

sentences.en: In English we call it an abacus.
sentences.cn: 在英语里我们叫它为一个算盘。

sentences.en: In response to declining math skills among their students, some Japanese schools are bringing back an ancient calculating device - the abacus.
sentences.cn: 为了改善学生日渐衰退的计算能力，日本的一些学校重新使用起一个古老的计算工具-算盘。

sentences.en: She can reckon rapidly on the abacus.
She is a passive person like an abacus, lacking initiative in everything.
sentences.cn: 她是个算盘珠似的人, 从来做事都是缺乏主动性的.

sentences.en: The abacus fell down on the ground and the beads went everywhere.
sentences.cn: 算盘摔到了地上,算盘珠散落一地.

sentences.en: The abacus is still in use today Chinatowns abroad.
sentences.cn: 现在,已经进入了电子计算机时代,但是古老的算盘仍然发挥着重要的作用.

sentences.en: The abacus is the ancestor of the modern computer.
sentences.cn: 算盘是现代电脑的原型.

sentences.en: The children are learning to do their sums on an abacus.
The clerk reckoned the expenditure last week with an abacus.
sentences.cn: 那位职员用算盘将上周的花销计算出来.

sentences.en: The room was very quiet. Even the sound of the abacus was stilled.
sentences.cn: 屋子里宁静了片刻,算盘珠子的声音也已经停止了.

sentences.en: They do use an abacus when they count, do they?
sentences.cn: 他们计算的时候用算盘, 不是 吗 ?

sentences.en: They don't use an abacus when they count, right?
sentences.cn: 他们计算时用算盘, 对 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a frame with small balls that can be slid along on thick wires, used for counting and calculating
